metatags.twitter:creator: @Reuters
metatags.og:description: An image of a warehouse filled with cardboard boxes being shared online was not taken in May 2022 and is unconnected to the shortage in baby formula in the United States. The photograph dates to April 2020 and shows a stockpile of medical masks in Los Angeles.
